title: Your main reason for playing League of Legends?
body:
We all play for our own goals, and all of us want to enjoy different aspects of this game.

For me, my favorite thing about league is the concept of mastering a champion, especially difficult ones. For example, when I was starting off playing Azir, I was spamming him on Lonian at ~gold 1. I was doing horribly; could not use my abilities for Sh-t, couldn't combo the enemy laner, could hardly even keep my KDA positive half the time. Slowly, I began to test the waters, attempting to drift even when failing. It slowly got easier and better, and now I am a pretty mechanically-refined Azir player.

Right now I am doing the same thing on Jayce, trying to get as good as possible. I'd say i'm moving alot faster-paced right now than I was when I was starting out with Jayce. I am getting the hang of "Q-Eing" with the gate right ontop of you, and my ability to use melee form is getting alot more refined.

What do you guys strive for in League?
